info.name: Stereopay
info.description:
## Stereopay Task Assessment

#### BaseURL: {{base_url}}

### Documentation

This document specifies the documentation for all the Application Programming Interface Endpoints that the Backend of this Web Application provide.

### Environment

There are multiple environments and with each environment comes with its **Environment Variable.**

Frontend Developers viewing this **docs** can easily switch between environments and have the necessary parameters automatically placed for them.
